scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:production: npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.copy-assets: xcopy /E /I /Y inc dist\inc >nul && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Copy-Item -Path *.php -Destination dist\ -Force" && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Copy-Item -Path README.md -Destination dist\ -Force"
scripts.zip: cd dist && (if exist sweet-portofolio rmdir /s /q sweet-portofolio) && mkdir sweet-portofolio && xcopy /E /I /Y assets sweet-portofolio\assets >nul && xcopy /E /I /Y inc sweet-portofolio\inc >nul && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Copy-Item -Path *.php -Destination sweet-portofolio\ -Force" && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Copy-Item -Path README.md -Destination sweet-portofolio\ -Force" && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Compress-Archive -Force -Path '.\sweet-portofolio' -DestinationPath '.\sweet-portofolio.zip'"
